item.title: 塔卢拉-威利斯（Tallulah Willis）首次公开自己成年后被诊断患有自闭症。这位布鲁斯-威利斯（Bruce Willis）和黛米-摩尔（Demi Moore）的女儿现年 30 岁，她在社交媒体上透露了自己的诊断结果。
item.description:
Tallulah Willis is opening up for the first time about being diagnosed with autism as an adult. The 30-year-old daughter of Bruce Willis and Demi Moore revealed the diagnosis on social media. https://t.co/7JM5TazRkT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在当地新闻媒体《高谭主义者》（The Gothamist）报道了史坦顿岛一所学校发现数百本新书被扔进垃圾桶的事件后，纽约市教育官员对这一说法进行了调查，其中许多是关于有色人种和男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者身份的新书。
item.description:
NYC education officials investigating claims that hundreds of new books — many that were about people of color and LGBTQ identities — were thrown in the trash at a Staten Island school after local news outlet The Gothamist reported the discovery. https://t.co/ml82cDooyD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 阿波罗10号的指挥官、宇航员托马斯-斯塔福德（Thomas P. Stafford）周一去世，享年93岁。斯塔福德曾指挥过 1969 年登月和美苏首次太空对接的彩排飞行。
item.description:
Astronaut Thomas P. Stafford, commander of Apollo 10, died Monday at the age of 93. Stafford had commanded a dress rehearsal flight for the 1969 moon landing and the first U.S.-Soviet space linkup. https://t.co/WhZI3qmZec pic.twitter.com/F7BA9xRN8m

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 研究发现，水下扬声器播放来自健康珊瑚礁的声音（如鱼叫声）有助于恢复退化的珊瑚礁。
item.description:
Underwater speakers playing sounds from a healthy reef, such as fish calls, could help restore degraded coral reefs, study finds. https://t.co/3HrFwtg8Wi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 托比-凯斯是今年入选乡村音乐名人堂的艺术家之一。
item.description:
Toby Keith is among the artists being inducted into the Country Music Hall of Fame this year.https://t.co/HfTJLJjJuw pic.twitter.com/uoIdo9O3Qt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最近，一个蹒跚学步的孩子在妈妈分享了一段姐姐从幼儿园回家后小宝宝激动反应的视频后，俘获了网友的心。
item.description:
A toddler recently captured the internet's heart after her mom shared a video of the little one's thrilled reaction to her older sister coming home from preschool.https://t.co/lI4KLa9BrS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 周一晚，SpaceX 将 22 颗 Starlink 卫星送入低地轨道。南加州部分地区都能看到烟羽。
item.description:
SpaceX launched 22 Starlink satellites into low-Earth orbit Monday night. The plume could be seen throughout parts of Southern California. pic.twitter.com/jjMCnKlz5x

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 织物和工艺品零售商 Joann 已申请破产保护。这家总部位于俄亥俄州的公司在一份声明中表示，预计最早将于下月底摆脱破产：
item.description:
Fabric and crafts retailer Joann has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection. The Ohio-based company said in a statement that it expected to emerge from bankruptcy as early as the end of next month.

Read more: https://t.co/8DYGOkEbgx pic.twitter.com/IETF1AsP1K

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 根据古特马赫研究所（Guttmacher Institute）的一项新研究，2023 年药物流产将占美国所有人工流产的 63%。
item.description:
Medication abortion accounted for 63% of all the abortions performed in the U.S. in 2023, according to a new study from the Guttmacher Institute.https://t.co/M6G4DyIZaw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 据报道，在斯洛伐克的一条街道上发现了一只棕熊，当时有多人被棕熊撞成重伤。利普托夫斯基-米库拉什市（Liptovský Mikuláš）在当局搜寻棕熊的过程中宣布进入紧急状态。
item.description:
A brown bear was spotted barreling down a street in Slovakia after multiple people were reportedly seriously injured by the bear.

The city of Liptovský Mikuláš declared a state of emergency while authorities searched for the bear. pic.twitter.com/yHXh9pV3Oa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 周一，全国有 70 多家企业关门歇业，以示团结，呼吁联邦实行带薪家庭假和医疗假。
item.description:
More than 70 businesses across the country shut their doors Monday in a show of solidarity to call for federal paid family and medical leave. https://t.co/apV0heB8VN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 本周一，班克斯的一幅新壁画吸引了大批人群来到伦敦的一条街道，甚至在这位难以捉摸的涂鸦艺术家确认这幅作品是他的作品之前：
item.description:
A new Banksy mural drew crowds to a London street on Monday, even before the elusive graffiti artist confirmed that the work was his.

Banksy later claimed the work by posting before and after photos of the location on his Instagram account.

Learn more: https://t.co/3SpFjRq0TL pic.twitter.com/V9iYQ7aIhs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 复活节即将来临，但巧克力的价格可能会让一些人在这个甜蜜的节日到来之前留下苦涩的回味。
item.description:
Easter is on the horizon, but the price of chocolate may leave a bitter aftertaste for some people leading up to the sweet holiday. https://t.co/AMRvzA30SV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国大使周一宣布，美国和日本将发起一项联合国安理会决议，呼吁所有国家不要在太空部署或发展核武器。
item.description:
The United States and Japan are sponsoring a U.N. Security Council resolution calling on all nations not to deploy or develop nuclear weapons in space, the U.S. ambassador announced Monday.https://t.co/IoSja4dk8g

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 周一，当热气球从澳大利亚第二大城市墨尔本郊区上空飞过时，一名男子从热气球上坠落身亡。
item.description:
A man fell to his death from a hot-air balloon Monday as it passed over suburban Melbourne, Australia's second-largest city. https://t.co/mimU3LWewW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 研究发现，水下扬声器播放来自健康珊瑚礁的声音（如鱼叫声）有助于恢复退化的珊瑚礁。
item.description:
Underwater speakers playing sounds from a healthy reef, such as fish calls, could help restore degraded coral reefs, study finds. https://t.co/fIbs58Eb2N

item.title: 俄亥俄州一位母亲在休假期间将 16 个月大的女儿独自留在家中的婴儿床上 10 天后死亡，周一这位母亲被判处终身监禁，不得假释。
item.description:
An Ohio mother whose 16-month-old daughter died after being left home alone in a playpen for 10 days while she went on vacation was sentenced Monday to life in prison with no chance of parole. https://t.co/zvglPP9yQI pic.twitter.com/M1i9RbezwS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: Dre告诉詹姆斯-科登（James Corden）的播客，在他因脑动脉瘤住院期间，医生告诉他，他还患有三次中风：
item.description:
Dr. Dre is opening up about the time he was hospitalized for a brain aneurysm three years ago.

Dre told James Corden's podcast that while he was hospitalized for a brain aneurysm, doctors told him he also suffered three strokes.

Learn more: https://t.co/XykeBE2tRV pic.twitter.com/XcXbCtyy7g

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: Keri Bergere 描述了上个月在西雅图东部山区被美洲狮袭击的惊险时刻。幸运的是，一群骑自行车的同伴及时伸出援手，挽救了她的生命：
item.description:
Keri Bergere is describing the frightening moment a cougar attacked her last month in the mountains east of Seattle.\

She suffered facial injuries and nerve damage. Luckily, a group of fellow cyclists came to her aid in time to save her life.

More here: https://t.co/bf7iAksgRi pic.twitter.com/jhVfH2h4Ya

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国国会警察总长表示，美国国会警察周一开始佩戴随身摄像机，作为其试点计划的一部分，以保护其警员和国会议员，并增强公众信任。
item.description:
The U.S. Capitol Police on Monday started wearing body-worn cameras as part of its pilot program to protect its officers and members of Congress as well as enhance public trust, the department's chief said. https://t.co/K5l0BXJQMA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 纽约州官员称，一名男子的宠物鳄鱼 "艾伯特 "在家中被非法饲养，该男子正在为保住自己的宠物鳄鱼而斗争。
item.description:
A man is fighting to keep his pet alligator, named "Albert," after New York state officials say it was seized from his home where it was being kept illegally. https://t.co/N33Bs0sAyc pic.twitter.com/qOKB1Oo8Zv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国环保局（EPA）已宣布全面禁止石棉，这种致癌物质每年导致数以万计的美国人死亡。但一些氯漂白剂、刹车片和其他产品中仍在使用石棉：
item.description:
The EPA has announced a comprehensive ban on asbestos, a carcinogen that kills tens of thousands of Americans a year. It is still used in some chlorine bleach, brake pads and other products.

Learn more: https://t.co/5vMrzFRLCM pic.twitter.com/vHXyj8fxoD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 俄亥俄州一位母亲在休假期间将 16 个月大的女儿独自留在家中的婴儿床上 10 天后死亡，周一这位母亲被判处终身监禁，不得假释。
item.description:
An Ohio mother whose 16-month-old daughter died after being left home alone in a playpen for 10 days while she went on vacation was sentenced Monday to life in prison with no chance of parole. https://t.co/qbtQnD4tqi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 首席大法官约翰-罗伯茨（John Roberts）写道，他认为 "没有理由不同意 "下级法院的意见，下级法院也驳回了纳瓦罗的请求。
item.description:
Chief Justice John Roberts wrote that he saw "no reason to disagree" with lower courts, which also rejected Navarro's request.

Navarro's appeal on the merits remains pending, but he will have to begin serving his sentence in the meantime.https://t.co/u2Z5vD3cMt pic.twitter.com/q2cYoo2x4A

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 托比-凯斯被追认为乡村音乐名人堂的一员。
item.description:
Toby Keith has earned a posthumous induction to Country Music Hall of Fame. https://t.co/coch3nACjj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普的律师周一表示，他在获得保释金以履行 4.64 亿美元的民事欺诈判决方面正面临 "难以克服的困难"：
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump is facing "insurmountable difficulties" in obtaining a bond to satisfy the $464 million civil fraud judgment, his attorneys said Monday.

Learn more: https://t.co/qMJwER1zJS pic.twitter.com/HKlGOCL2Cy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 艾伦研究所的研究人员正在开展 "登月 "项目，比如绘制人脑地图，希望借此了解人体器官，帮助防治脑部疾病。
item.description:
Researchers at the Allen Institute are pursing "moonshot" projects, like mapping the human brain, in hopes of understanding the organ and to help fight brain diseases. https://t.co/GN7ReupRBr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 联合国多个组织警告说，加沙一半以上的人口面临 "灾难性饥饿"。
item.description:
Famine is "imminent" in northern Gaza, according to a report released Monday.

Multiple U.N. organizations have warned that more than half the population in Gaza faces "catastrophic hunger."https://t.co/IACv9L3Bcv pic.twitter.com/QDjkBNHv0Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 法官裁定，与 "Access Hollywood "录像带有关的证据可被采纳，Stormy Daniels 可以在特朗普封口费案中作证。
item.description:
Evidence related to the "Access Hollywood" tape is admissible and Stormy Daniels can testify in Trump hush money trial, judge rules. https://t.co/U15qW6o7sL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在消防员努力扑灭康涅狄格州一场房屋火灾的同时，另一项行动也在进行之中--营救一只在楼上阳台上被发现的猫。
item.description:
As firefighters worked to extinguish a house fire in Connecticut, another operation was underway — the rescue of a cat spotted on an upstairs balcony. https://t.co/cWJf37WRyC pic.twitter.com/Oz6th35AcK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024
